short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience Apocalypse Guardian - Defend Earth against alien invasions in this top-down shooter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience Apocalypse Guardian - Defend Earth against alien invasions in this top-down shooter. Master seven unique weapons and survive increasingly challenging waves while collecting power-ups.

Master Apocalypse Guardian's unique gameplay mechanics and challenge yourself to new achievements.

Apocalypse Guardian Controls Guide

Movement Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys - Move character
Mouse - Aim weapon

Game Actions:
Left Click - Shoot
R - Reload weapon
Space - Dodge roll
E - Pick up weapons

Apocalypse Guardian Features
Discover what makes Apocalypse Guardian unique and exciting:
- Seven unique weapons with different shooting patterns
- Dynamic weapon drop system
- Progressive wave-based challenges
- Epic boss battles
- Strategic combat mechanics
- Multiple difficulty levels
- Achievement system
- High score tracking
